ext_description.p: A Document_definition is one of potentially more alternative representations of a Document_version. It represents a view of a document version relevant for the requirements of one (of possibly multiple alternative) applications using different formats.
ext_description.example: A version of a logical document, which contains a shape model, may be represented in the different native formats of two 3D CAD systems.
ext_description.p: Each Document_definition is a Digital_document_definition or a Physical_document_definition.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The id specifies the identifier of the Document_definition.
The description specifies additional information about the Document_definition.
The associated_document_version specifies the version of the logical document that is being represented.

A Digital_document_definition is a type ofDocument_definition. It represents a view of a document version relevant for the requirements of one (of possibly multiple alternative) applications using a digital representation format. A digital document definition may consist of one or many component digital files.
The file specifies a computer interpretable realization of the Digital_document_definition.

A Physical_document_definition is a type of Document_definition. It represents a view of a document version relevant for the requirements of one (of possibly multiple alternative) applications using a physical representation format. A physical document definition may consist of one or many component hardcopy files.
The component specifies the physical realization of the Physical_document_definition.
